A

add(Author[], Author) - Static method in class cscd210methods.CSCD210Lab10Methods
The add method is passed the array and an Author object
1) A new Author array is created of length of the old array + 1
2) The Authors from the old array are copied into the new array
3) The new Author is added in the last index of the new array
4) The new array is returned
ArrayUtils<T> - Class in cscd210utils
The ArrayUtils class performs basic array functions, such as adding an item to the array removing items from the array, printing the arrays.
All parameters will be passed as final.

F

fillArray(Scanner) - Static method in class cscd210methods.CSCD210Lab10Methods
The fillArray method
1) Prompts for the number of authors and ensures it is greater than 0
2) Creates an array of Author for the total number 3) reads the first, last name, publisher, and number of books 4) Builds an author object
5) Puts that author object into the array
6) When done filling the array returns the array
first - Variable in class cscd210classes.Author
Private String for the first name

linearSearch(T[], T) - Static method in class cscd210utils.SearchUtils
Simple linear search that works on any Object based type If the item is found in the array then the index returned
If the item is not found in the array and message is printed to the screen and negative 1 is returned
This method must call the equals method of the appropriate class.

R

readAuthor(Scanner) - Static method in class cscd210methods.CSCD210Lab10Methods
The readAuthor method prompts the user for the first and last name the publisher and the nubmer of books.
remove(Author[], int) - Static method in class cscd210methods.CSCD210Lab10Methods
The remove method is passed the array and an index
1) If the index is -1 or the array length is 0 then the original array is returned
2) A new Author array is created of length of the old array - 1
2) The Authors from the old array are copied into the new array except for the index that is being removed
4) The new array is returned
ReverseNumBooksNotReversePublisherComparator - Class in cscd210comparators
The comparator for reverse number of books and the publisher which is not reverse
